name: @miriad-systems/nuum
description: AI coding agent with continuous memory - infinite context across sessions

scripts.build: bun build ./src/cli/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target bun && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='./dist/index.js';fs.writeFileSync(f,fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8').replace('#!/usr/bin/env node','#!/usr/bin/env bun'))"
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run typecheck
scripts.release: bun run build && bun run typecheck && npm publish --access public

author: Miriad Systems

acknowledgments.letta: Memory architecture patterns - three-tier memory, agent-editable memory, sleeptime workers
acknowledgments.opencode: Tool system, shell execution, permission system infrastructure
